roleset.name: unable to be made to function

example.name: with CAU
example.text: If a veto is unworkable because it would leave part of the executive branch unfunded , the president could sign the appropriations bills into law and assert a power of excision , declaring the rider restricting his Article II powers to be unconstitutional and severable .

propbank.arg: because it would leave part of the executive branch unfunded

roleset.note: UNWORKABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WSJ data. Corresponds to work-v.09. (from unworkable.01-j)

roleset.name: unable to be manipulated (physically, usually)

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: This specimen proved simply unworkable into tablets or granules and had to be discarded .

example.name: arg1
example.text: By the time I got it running again , the sun was out and the clay was unworkable , so I went on to the garden tiller .

propbank.arg: By the time I got it running again
so I went on to the garden tiller

roleset.note: UNWORKABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on work-v.07. Corresponds to VNcls knead-26.5. (from unworkable.02-j)
